name: Klad
description:
Gameplay features that distinguish Klad from similar games of the time (most notably Lode Runner):

  • inability to dig holes;
  • the ability to shoot left and right, removes walls of a certain type for a short time;
  • when falling from a height onto a certain type of floor, the character falls through it;
  • there is water, fire and similar obstacles;
  • there are no rungs on which you can crawl (and unhook from them).
